column4: now shutting down has an error: CIFS VFS: server not responding: CIFS VFS: No response for cmd 50 mid ...
and then it waits ~1 min and the stops the computer (turn off the power)
I've seen the same behavior... did you define an SMB mount or something in /etc/fstab?
what is SMB mount? ;)
well, the CIFS mount is a windows (SMB) filesystem connection
